html:
3.12.21  12:20 pm   What is a good way to get your music some exposure and a real audience without sacrificing artistic expression in favor of marketability?

      that's simple. just don't go to the market. some of the realest audiences might not even be going to the market. If you have a good enough time for long enough, the market will come to you. That's how markets get all their best stuff

3.12.21  11:43 am   what face are you making right now?

      regular

3.12.21  7:00 am   https://billwurtz.com/la-de-da-chorus.jpg  https://billwurtz.com/here-comes-the-sun-write.jpg is these images are the initial writing of "la de da de da de da de day oh" (September 17, 2012) and "here comes the sun" (August 3, 2010) respectively?

     yes, except the verse for 'la de da' was actually written 3 years earlier as a different song, and it was different

3.12.21  5:53 am   Why are you so talented

      could be some kind of childhood defense mechanism

3.12.21  1:21 am   If you dislike your songs a little bit each why don't you make something as best as you can?

     that's what i do every time

     So that you can't imagine any better?

     i can always imagine better

     Why would you do anything else?

     i always do the best i can

     Are you phoning it in?

     no

3.12.21  1:05 am   how do deal with technology addiction

      use your knowledge of technology to make even more technology

3.11.21  11:03 pm   Do you believe in a higher power(s)?

      higher than what

3.11.21  11:01 pm   when you first released might quit, i thought it was a good song but not like mindblowingly so. now i've gone through some personal trials and challenges, and my playlist just shuffled to it, and it pierced my soul so deeply and so differently that i was literally floored. like actually had to stop what i was doing and sit down. isn't it fuckin magical how one piece of music can change for us like that? and carry so many different messages for us to unlock at different points in our journeys, as long as we keep our hearts open to it? i'm glad might quit stuck around in my life to remind me of that.

      it probably all depends on whether you were hearing the rhythm as 4 small groups of 3 (correct, groovy) or 3 small groups of 2 (incorrect, lame). This is one of the hazards of using 'trinary' rhythms

3.11.21  10:51 pm   Opinion on chairs? 

      never heard of it

3.11.21  10:34 pm   When will you make a new video

      doing it now

3.11.21  9:21 pm   do you dislike capital letters 

      no

3.11.21  8:51 pm   why are you so outrageous?

      just trying to get by

3.11.21  8:46 pm   how do i stop having nightmares

      you must convey them in a tangible medium

3.11.21  8:21 pm   Is cereal a soup

      no, but it is a sandwich and a hotdog

3.11.21  8:13 pm   why is it all so weird?

     how else could it possibly be

     I guess I'm weird

3.11.21  7:08 pm   why does the world spin

      to give all sides a chance

3.11.21  6:52 pm   Are there any songs of yours that you dislike

     all of them, a little bit

      and why?

     because i could imagine them better, and the only person responsible for the way they actually turned out was me

3.11.21  5:04 pm   in 'slow down' is 12:30 am or pm

      unspecified

3.11.21  4:45 pm   I'm going back to in-person school in April after quarantining for so long. My question is, how do I make friends there? 

      i'm not sure

3.11.21  3:13 pm   do you write your songs with lyrics that are nonsensical at first glance intentionally,

     no

      lyrics which require more attention in order to find the true meaning?

     the gold standard, in my opinion, is when the true meaning exerts itself fully, the first time. and perhaps might be powerful enough that it makes you want to think about it more, to figure out how the heck that could have felt the way it did

     or is it just a byproduct of the meaning in the first place?

     the meaning, in my opinion, is the product. i am really a meaning salesman when you get right down to it

3.11.21  2:58 pm   Are you still working on songs?

     yes

     also keep up the great work its amazing

3.11.21  2:55 pm   Why is your music filled with so much passion and unique qualities?

      i'm just trying to do my job to the best of my abilities

3.11.21  2:32 pm   what do you make of the fact that the sun will devour us in billions of years?

      if that's true, then that's good news for human life expectancy because i thought that was still less than 100 years, which from what i understand is way sooner than the sun will be devouring anyone

3.11.21  1:31 pm   what rhymes with applepie

      black and white

3.11.21  12:45 pm   Your videos are amazing! Will you do a face reveal?

      no way

3.11.21  12:39 pm   i have constructed an entire universe in my brain but i am too weak to show everyone. i'm wondering how to get stronger

     start by writing things down. Even if it doesn't seem relevant to anything, writing is possibly one of the first lines of attack in opening up the lines of communication, one door at a time

     and if it's even worth it in the end

     yes. any entire universe is worth it

3.11.21  11:57 am   I have three favorites of yours -- Might Quit, Christmas Isn't Real, and Slow Down. I really want to see the scores for these before you produced them. Is that something you'd be willing share? 

      i have some good and bad news for you, which is that the scores for those might look something like this

3.11.21  11:56 am   what are your thoughts on current world problems?

      fixable

3.11.21  9:14 am   Is 'at the airport terminal' about afterlife?

      also before and during

3.11.21  8:58 am   Can I change the time signature for a moment if i don't have enough lyrics/notes, or if i have too many lyrics/notes?

      yes

3.11.21  5:20 am   do you have any tips on how to deal with social anxiety?

      see if you can notice how anxious other people are too

3.11.21  3:47 am   do i have time to make up for all this time i'm wasting?

      just barely

3.11.21  1:51 am   what isn't music?

      usually something that actually turns out to be music

3.11.21  1:20 am   hey bill guess what number im thinking

      578209

3.10.21  11:38 pm   What do I do if I don't have enough time?

      you might have to think more creatively, or less creatively, depending on how creatively you were thinking before

3.10.21  9:46 pm   how do you decide whether a set of chords needs words or can stay an instrumental

      you could try giving a corporate presentation, of just those chords. And see whether people seem bored, or enthralled. Maybe even just imagine doing that presentation in your mind

3.10.21  9:28 pm   who decides whether a song is good?

      you may have to do it

3.10.21  8:48 pm   how to grieve properly

      sing songs of joy

3.10.21  8:21 pm   can i force inspiration to strike?

     not really

      is it less meaningful when it's artificial or would you consider it perfectly organic?

      it's never artificial. if it happened, then it did indeed happen

3.10.21  8:20 pm   Are there so many relgigious motives in your songs because you have a strong faith or do you just throw them in there for the vibes?

      those are the vibes of faith. and, in turn, i do have faith in those vibes

3.10.21  8:15 pm   i'm gonna be all alone in a new state next year for college. no friends, family, etc. what do i do? should i try to make friends?

      how about inventing a new city

3.10.21  6:32 pm   did you actually go to an airport terminal shortly before writing the song?

      shortly before writing the first line. the rest of the song was written later

3.10.21  5:56 pm   how do you create a couch?

      extrude a box, make 2 edge loops near each end, make 2 edge loops near the back, then lower the largest face on top

3.10.21  4:41 pm   what is free will?

      you can change your mind

3.10.21  3:10 pm   how does the rhythm of "oh, baby is that so wrong" work? i can't figure out what's going on there rhythmically (as in a lot of that song)

      it was written like this, and it was performed more like this

3.10.21  2:27 pm   just met up with a friend the other day, we had a good time together. we're going to get together again soon, but she'll be travelling out of state and will have to quarantine when she gets back. what should i do in the meantime, so i don't lose my freaking mind?

      how about inventing a new city

3.10.21  2:18 pm   are you good at rhythm games?

      yes

3.10.21  12:36 pm   Whats the best way to make an egg?

      gotta make a chicken first

3.10.21  12:00 pm   what to do in case of writer's block?

      this may not be what you want to hear, but, you're gonna have to go ahead and write something

3.10.21  11:54 am   What do you feel about books?

      i like the part where you get to turn the page
